description: Kelly Criterion strategy - Dynamic position sizing based on ML predicted win rate and historical profit/loss ratio
notes: base_volume: Initial volume before Kelly calculation kicks in
max_volume: Maximum allowed volume per trade
min_volume: Minimum volume to execute trade
kelly_fraction: Fraction of Kelly to use (0.25 = 1/4 Kelly, safer)
min_trades_for_kelly: Minimum trades needed to calculate Kelly
account_balance: Total account balance for position sizing
max_position_pct: Maximum position as % of balance (0.5 = 50%)
rebalance_threshold: Position deviation % to trigger rebalance (0.1 = 10%)
min_samples_for_training: Minimum trades to train ML model (100)
retrain_interval: Retrain model every N trades (50)
- Price and price momentum (5 and 20 periods)
